${ModID}:Wisdom.NAME: Wisdom
${ModID}:Wisdom.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL If a *Scarecrow exhausts this card, *Stun it next turn.

${ModID}:FragmentOfBliss.NAME: Fragment of Bliss
${ModID}:FragmentOfBliss.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block. NL This card is not affected by Block modifiers.

${ModID}:FalseThrone.NAME: False Throne
${ModID}:FalseThrone.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, put ALL non-Status non-Curse cards from your exhaust pile into your hand and give them Ethereal.

${ModID}:Smile.NAME: Smile
${ModID}:Smile.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Mimicry.NAME: Mimicry
${ModID}:Mimicry.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Heal HP equal to unblocked damage.

${ModID}:Nihil.NAME: Nihil
${ModID}:Nihil.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. NL If you have no cards in hand, this effect is doubled.

${ModID}:FadedMemories.NAME: Faded Memories
${ModID}:FadedMemories.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card for every enemy in combat.

${ModID}:LoveAndHate.NAME: In the Name of Love and Hate

${ModID}:GoldRush.NAME: Gold Rush
${ModID}:GoldRush.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL If the last card played this combat was an Attack, double your Strength.

${ModID}:BlindRage.NAME: Blind Rage
${ModID}:BlindRage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Take !M! damage. NL If your HP is at or below 50%, this card costs 0.

${ModID}:SwordSharpened.NAME: Sword Sharpened With Tears
${ModID}:SwordSharpened.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL When you play this card on the same enemy !ruina:SecondMagic! times, instead apply 1 *Stun and exhaust this card.
${ModID}:SwordSharpened.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile. NL When you play this card on the same enemy !ruina:SecondMagic! times, instead apply 1 *Stun and exhaust this card.

${ModID}:Lumber.NAME: Lumber
${ModID}:Lumber.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust up to !M! cards. For each Attack exhausted, add its base damage to this card's damage.

${ModID}:Harvest.NAME: Harvest
${ModID}:Harvest.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This card deals less damage as your HP percent drops (deals max damage at full HP).
${ModID}:Harvest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This card deals less damage as your HP percent drops (deals max damage at full HP). NL Gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:HomingInstinct.NAME: Homing Instinct
${ModID}:HomingInstinct.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! card. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E] equal to the cost of the exhausted card.

${ModID}:CobaltScar.NAME: Cobalt Scar
${ModID}:CobaltScar.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play !ruina:SecondMagic! Attacks, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Thirst.NAME: Thirst
${ModID}:Thirst.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ruina:Bleed. NL This turn, whenever you attack an enemy with ruina:Bleed, gain !ruina:SecondMagic! Strength.

${ModID}:CrimsonScar.NAME: Crimson Scar
${ModID}:CrimsonScar.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Scry !M!. NL For each card discarded, gain !ruina:SecondMagic! Vigor.

${ModID}:ParadiseLost.NAME: Paradise Lost
${ModID}:ParadiseLost.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Exhaust up to !M! card. NL Whenever !ruina:SecondMagic! cards are Exhausted, ALL enemies lose 666 HP.
${ModID}:ParadiseLost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Exhaust up to !M! cards. NL Whenever !ruina:SecondMagic! cards are Exhausted, ALL enemies lose 666 HP.

${ModID}:DeadSilence.NAME: Dead Silence

${ModID}:SoundOfAStar.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL This card's damage is increased by the amount of Block you've gained this combat. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

${ModID}:Apocalypse.NAME: Apocalypse
${ModID}:Apocalypse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals 50% more damage if your HP is at or below 50%. NL Deals 50% more damage to enemies with 50% or less HP.

${ModID}:Beak.NAME: Beak

, kill it. NL Enemy loses !M! HP.
